###########################
SpiCE Corpus Documentation
###########################

SpiCE is a forthcoming open-access corpus of conversational
bilingual **Sp**\ eech **i**\ n **C**\ antonese and **E**\ nglish.
Stay tuned for updates here. Contact khia.johnson@ubc.ca with any
questions.


.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 3

    about.rst
    design.rst
    download.rst
    research.rst
